verbs.description: As [ARG1: the spotlight] [V: lands] [ARG2: on this tiny nation of 5.5 million] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of the historic summit meeting between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , many seemed to be taking the massive operation in stride . Some locals expressed a sense of pride about their city - state hosting the event .
